sentences: Parties agreed to the agenda (FCCC/SBI/2006/1 and Corr.1) and organization of work after deleting an item on application of the COP -GEF Council memorandum of understanding, and agreeing that submissions on matters related to Protocol Article 3.14(a dverse effects) would be provided intersessionally.
József Feiler (Hungary) and Phetolo Phage David Lesolle (Botswana) were elected as Vice-Chair and Rapporteur, respectively.
South Africa, for the G-77/CHINA, emphasized the Special Climate Change Fund and Adaptation Fund.
Bangladesh, for LDCs, urged implementation of national adaptation plans of action (NAPAs).
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
